original_text: “Our ancestors had the tabernacle of the covenant law with them in the wilderness. It had been made as God directed Moses, according to the pattern he had seen.
korean_text: 광야에서 우리 조상들에게 증거의 장막이 있었으니 이것은 모세에게 말씀하신 이가 명하사 그가 본 그 양식대로 만들게 하신 것이라

sentences.original_text: Our ancestors had tabernacle of covenant law
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 조상들은 언약 법궤가 있는 장막을 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: It had been made as God directed Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 모세에게 지시하신 대로 만들어졌습니다

sentences.original_text: according to pattern he had seen
